import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Grid, Icon, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react' import EmployeeCard from '../../components/EmployeeCard/EmployeeCard' import EmployeeModal from '../../components/EmployeeModal/EmployeeModal' import "./dashboard.css" import EmployeeFilter from '../../components/EmployeeFilter/EmployeeFilter' const Dashboard = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedEmp, setSelectedEmp] = useState(open || ""); const clickHandler = (emp) => { setOpen(!open); setSelectedEmp(emp); } console.log("open:", open) console.log("selectedEmp:", selectedEmp); return (
) } export default Dashboard
